duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct outbound prospecting through cold calling, email marketing, and social media marketing campaigns to drive revenue growth.
Maintain customer relationships by following up with existing customers and processing their orders efficiently.
Collaborate with Sales and Marketing Teams to develop targeted lists, call strategies, and messaging to generate new business opportunities.
Assist in providing accurate repair estimates to existing customers by working closely with the repair team.
Other duties as required to support business development activities.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or Equivalent. Bachelor’s degree or equivalent is a plus.
